2018

Following is a byproduct when we(with Jiaze Qiu and Yixuan Tan) try to reproduce this paper: Fast Patch-based Style Transfer of Arbitrary Style, which is based on convolutional nerual network.

2017

A drunk man will find his way home, but a drunk bird may get lost forever.

-- Shizuo Kakutani

The first time I heard this story is from my instructor of Applied Stochastic Processes, Prof. Dayue Chen.

Another example I learnd in this course is that, “Life is a martingale.” Though he meant that life is therefore ergodic and don’t feel upset when you meet troubles, I still hope it can be a submartingale.
